title: BRIEF-Western Forest Products & United Steelworkers Local 1-1937 Expect To Begin Mediation On Sept 13
text:
BRIEF-Western Forest Products & United Steelworkers Local 1-1937 Expect To Begin Mediation On Sept 13

Stock Markets 2 minutes ago (Sep 04, 2019 20:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Western Forest Products & United Steelworkers Local 1-1937 Expect To Begin Mediation On Sept 13 Sept 4 (Reuters) - Western Forest Products Inc : * WESTERN WELCOMES RETURN TO BARGAINING TABLE; RESPONDS TO NAFTA CHALLENGE PANEL DECISION * WESTERN FOREST PRODUCTS - CO AND UNITED STEELWORKERS LOCAL 1-1937 ("USW") EXPECT TO BEGIN MEDIATION WITH INDEPENDENT-MEDIATOR VINCE READY ON SEPT 13

BRIEF-Western Forest Products & United Steelworkers Local 1-1937 Expect To Begin Mediation On Sept 13
